snippet.title: blocks - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
blocks is a new minimalist platformer coming to Steam and itch.io on January 25th!The goal is to make it through the level without dying, clearing the stages with your various powerups and time mastery. As you progress through each world, the challenges become increasingly more difficult. 

blocks
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1004570/blocks/
itch.io: https://bluerichter.itch.io/blocks

Please share your opinion in the comments below!

Website: bluerichter.com
Instagram: @bluerichter (https://www.instagram.com/bluerichter/)
Twitter: @bluerichter (https://twitter.com/BlueRichter)
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bluerichters/
